name: Janos Moraiti
story: Dimitrios Nicolau was born and raised in a small village in Greece. He always had a passion for helping others and knew from a young age that he wanted to become a doctor. After completing medical school, Dimitrios joined the military as a Combat Life Saver to be able to provide medical aid to soldiers in the battlefield. He takes pride in his ability to remain calm and focused during chaotic situations, and is respected by his comrades for his skill as a medic.
